Translations.Text: Kandi niyo yaremye ibintu bibiri ikigabo n’ikigore mubintu vyose
Mu mbuto z’uruvyaro mugihe zisukiwe mugitereko c’uruvyaro
Kandi n’uko hejuru yayo hariho irindi zurwa ry’abantu
Kandi kuriyo niyo itanga ibikwiye ni vy’umusesekara
Kandi niwe Muremyi w’Inyenyeri yitiriwe Shi’ira
Kandi niyo yahoneje Aadi wambere
NaThamuda ntihasigaje n’umwe
N’imbere	y’abo	abantu	bo	kuntumwa	y’Imana	Nuhu	(iii)	nabone barahemukiye imitima yabo gusumba ayandi mabi cane
N’ibisagara vyacuranguwe ikaba ariyo yabi curanguye
Irabipfuka ivyapfutswe
N’iyihe migisha y’Umuremyi wawe uyigirira ko amakenga
Uyu n’uwutuza mubatuza bakera
Icaduka kiri hafi kiregereje
Ntawushobora kugikura ho atari Imana yonyene
Mbega mutangazwa n’ibi biganiro
N’ugutwenga, kandi mutarira
Murasamaye gusa
Rero nimu pfukamire Imana kandi muyisenge
Umwanya wageze, n’Ukwezi kwamanyutse
Nibabona igitangaro baca bahindukira k’urundi ruhande n’ukuvuga bati:- ubu n’uburozi bwiwe buguma bubandanya
Barahakanye ibi vyose baca bakurikira ivyo imitima yabo yipfuza, n’ibintu vyose vy’Imana n’ibibaho
Mu vy’ukuri mwarashikiwe n’inkuru zibuza ibintu bikuru bikuru
Ubuhizi bukwiye mugabo ituza kuribo ntaco rimaze
Rero ni wirinde nabo, n’umusi azo hamagara uwuzo hamagara kukintu gihambaye cane
